Search for Flights
{{ flight }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: any =[ "British Airways", "China Air", "Qatar" ] constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
